alert.note: Alert for Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:35PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hendry and west central Palm Beach Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 535 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Montura, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Harbor and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
